item.title: ‘The Love That Remains’ Selected by Iceland as Oscar Candidate
item.description: The Icelandic Film and TV Academy has selected Hlynur Pálmason’s “The Love That Remains” as Iceland’s entry in the best international feature film category of the Academy Awards. The film,
